WorkItem.ClosedComment: We'll address this issue, which is also covered by issue #2.  Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
Docs for the Win8 sample app note to open the encyclopedia.sln file. That doesn't appear to be included. Without this the code doesn't run.

=== Running ===
Open encyclopedia\Encyclopedia.sln in Visual Studio 2012
F5

Comments.Message:
You should be able to open samples\win8\encyclopedia\Encyclopedia\Encyclopedia.jsproj directly, and run the sample from VS.

But we will also make sure to add the .sln file directly as well.

Open the *.jsproj file using File->Open Project in Visual Studio 2012 for Windows 8.

The *.jsproj files are (at least for me) associated with the desktop version.

By the way I've already created an "issue" for that: http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/2

Hey folks, running the jsproj results in a series of errors on build.

I am running Win8 in Parallels, trying to find another machine to verify this behavior but don't have another Win8 box around.
